idea-plugin.name: Unicode Code Points Converter
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin converts selected characters to Java UTF-16 presentation variant for Unicode Code Point Escapes and vice versa.
Conversion to code points is not affect characters in the ASCII subset of Unicode (U+0000 through U+007F).
Example:
Input: "1-й пример and 2-nd sample"
Output: "1-\u0439 \u043F\u0440\u0438\u043C\u0435\u0440 and 2-nd sample"
idea-plugin.change-notes: • v1.0 - Initial release of the Unicode Code Points Converter

action.text: Convert from Characters to Unicode Escapes
action.description: Escape characters that not in the ASCII subset of Unicode (U+0000 through U+007F) in selected text

action.text: Convert from Unicode Escapes to Characters
action.description: Unescape unicode code points found in selected text
